system.requirements: Dark Eldar, Pity the Weak, Weapon Skill 40
system.effect:
When making a Melee or Ranged Attack at Point Blank range against a Stunned or Prone enemy, the attack gains the Proven (4) Quality
Proven X: If weapon damage die rolls less than X, treat as if X was rolled.

description.value: When making a Melee or Ranged Attack at Point Blank range against a Stunned or Prone enemy, the attack gains the Proven (4) Quality Proven X: If weapon damage die rolls less than X, treat as if X was rolled.
